findings.title: Refactor logic of updating `TotalValidatorExitsRequested` and emitting relevant event
findings.description: The implementation of updating `TotalValidatorExitsRequested` and emitting the `RequestedValidatorExits` event during catch-up may lead to confusion for Node Operators, as it does not accurately reflect the most up-to-date count of exit requests for an operator including unsolicited exits.

findings.title: Use `_setCurrentValidatorExitsDemand`
findings.description: The event log will be different between the old and new implementations, affecting the accuracy of `RequestedValidatorExits` events during catch-up attempts.

findings.title: Potential outdated information in off-chain component due to discrepancy between events emitted between old and new implementations
findings.description: The event log will be different between the old and new implementations, potentially causing an off-chain component to read and process outdated information.
